scripts.build: npm run scripts && npm run styles
scripts.scripts: jshint . && browserify -s swoosh -do dist/swoosh.js swoosh.js && uglifyjs -m -c -o dist/swoosh.min.js dist/swoosh.js
scripts.oldstart: watchify -dvo example/example.min.js example/example.js & watchify -dvs swoosh -o dist/swoosh.js swoosh.js & stylus -w swoosh.styl --import node_modules/nib -o dist
scripts.styles: stylus swoosh.styl --import node_modules/nib -o dist && cleancss dist/swoosh.css -o dist/swoosh.min.css
scripts.start: tsc && concurrently "watchify -dvo example/example.min.js example/example.js" "watchify -dvs swoosh -o dist/swoosh.js swoosh.js" "stylus -w example/example.styl --import node_modules/nib -o example" "stylus -w swoosh.styl --import node_modules/nib -o dist" "npm run lite" "npm run tsc:w"
